Callback5Header: Bring the Kingsport Ale to Lyndon
Name: Drink to the Past
Phase0Description: I should see if Lyndon is interested in sharing a drink with me, as Kingsport ale is finer than the usual swill found in Backwater.
Toast: I should see if Lyndon is interested in sharing a drink with me, as Kingsport ale is finer than the usual swill found in Backwater.
